text:
From Shah Rukh To Aamir, Celebs Make A Glitzy Appearance At Akash Ambani-Shloka Mehta’s Wedding
From Shah Rukh To Aamir, Celebs Make A Glitzy Appearance At Akash Ambani-Shloka Mehta’s Wedding
After Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal’s wedding which took place last year, it is time for Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani’s son Akash Ambani to tie the knot with his fiancée Shloka Mehta.
Also read: Photos From Akash Ambani & Shloka Mehta's Fairytale Wedding Are Finally In & They're Beautiful
The wedding celebrations had begun last month itself when the Amabanis along with their 300 guests flew to Switzerland for a pre-wedding bash. It was a star-studded affair.
For the wedding, the celebrations have already begun. Bollywood stars have started arriving at the venue. From Shah Rukh Khan and Aamir Khan to Ranbir Kapoor and Karan Johar, these pictures will give you a glimpse of how everyone made a glitzy appearance at the venue. Take a look!

Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta will soon tie the knot at Jio World Centre in Bandra Kurla Complex.
Also Read: Photos From Akash Ambani & Shloka Mehta's Fairytale Wedding Are Finally In & They're Beautiful
title: From Shah Rukh To Aamir, Celebs Make A Glitzy Appearance At Akash Ambani-Shloka Mehta’s Wedding

The wedding celebrations had begun last month itself when the Amabanis along with their 300 guests flew to Switzerland for a pre-wedding bash. It was a star-studded affair.
